direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods process collections of elements and return an iterable of Ord objects.
Both methods iterate over collections and perform operations on each element.
Both methods reverse the order of elements, but one operates on arrays and the other on iterables.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the creation of an iterable of Ord objects.
Both methods iterate over collections, which can be used to set up the environment for testing reverse.
Both methods handle similar exceptions related to iterating over collections.
